AI in the Finance Industry

Artificial Intelligence (AI) has transformed the finance industry over the past few decades. From early rule-based systems to modern machine learning models, AI is now used for fraud detection, algorithmic trading, credit scoring, and customer service automation. Financial institutions leverage AI to analyze vast amounts of data in real-time, enabling smarter decision-making and improved operational efficiency.

As AI continues to evolve, its role in finance is expandingâ€”bringing both opportunities and challenges. This website explores one key application of AI in finance and its broader implications.
